select_credentials.title: Select Credentials
select_credentials.label_password_backup_reminder: Rotki saves all user data locally. I understand that if I lose my password, I lose access to my data. I have created a backup of the password.

validation.valid_username: A username must contain only alphanumeric characters and have no spaces
validation.password_confirmation_missmatch: The password confirmation does not match the provided password

usage_analytics.title: Usage analytics
usage_analytics.description: rotki is a local application and anonymous usage analytics is the only way for us to have an idea of how many people use our software, where they are from etc. These data are really important to us, are completely anonymous and help us create a better product for you.

validation.valid_username: A username must contain only alphanumeric characters and have no spaces

premium_credentials.tooltip: Enabling premium for a new account will restore the database associated with these credentials from the server. Ensure that the account uses the same password as the database originally backed up.

validation.non_empty_key: The API key cannot be empty
validation.non_empty_secret: The API secret cannot be empty

confirmation.title: Delete Trade
confirmation.message: Are you sure you want to delete the following trade: {action} of {amount} {pair}

deposits_withdrawals.title: Deposits & Withdrawals
deposits_withdrawals.label: asset movements
deposits_withdrawals.loading: Please wait while your asset movements are getting loaded...
deposits_withdrawals.loading_subtitle: The loading of asset movements might take a while depending on the amount of exchanges, and actions you performed on these exchanges.

upgrade_row.upgrade: Displaying {limit} out of {total} {label}. To view more please upgrade to {link}

fee.label: Fee
fee.hint: Fee if any of the trade that occurred

link.label: Link
link.hint: [Optional] A link to the trade. e.g. in an explorer

notes.label: Additional notes
notes.hint: [Optional] Additional notes to store for the trade

validation.non_empty_fee: The fee currency cannot be empty

confirmation.message: Are you sure you want to log out of your current rotki session?
confirmation.title: Confirmation Required

trade_history.loading: Please wait while your trades are getting loaded...
trade_history.loading_subtitle: The loading of trades might take a while depending on the amount of exchanges, and actions you performed on these exchanges.

transactions.loading: Please wait while your transactions are getting loaded...
transactions.loading_subtitle: The loading of transactions might take a while depending on the number of actions you performed.
transactions.title: Ethereum Transactions
transactions.label: transactions
